item.title: Linux 6.17 Will Let Multi-Device Filesystems Better Cope With Losing A Disk
item.description: The VFS changes were merged a short time ago to the in-development Linux 6.17 kernel. Among the notable changes there is a patch that will allow file-systems like Btrfs and Bcachefs to better handle losing a disk in their built-in RAID/multi-device capabilities...

item.description:

item.title: Bitcoin Faces Doomsday Scenario as Whales Exit – Bitcoin Hyper (HYPER) Rewrites the Narrative, ICO Hits $5.4M
item.description:
Bitcoin Hyper has raised over $5.4 M in presale funding to launch a Solana Virtual Machine Layer-2 on Bitcoin, which could channel DeFi, gaming, and fresh fees to the base chain as a $9 B Satoshi-era sell-off revives debate on long-term network sustainability.

item.title: Roman Storm Asks For Last Minute Contributions As Tornado Cash Case Comes To A Close
item.description:
Roman Storm has collected $3.2 million of a $5 million target for his legal defense as his federal money-laundering trial over Tornado Cash moves to closing arguments in Manhattan. Prosecutors allege the crypto mixer masked $1 billion, including funds tied to North Korea’s Lazarus Group.

The post Roman Storm Asks For Last Minute Contributions As Tornado Cash Case Comes To A Close appeared first on Cryptonews.
